definitions.title: vb. Pu.
definitions.body: be bound, joined (NH Pu. = BH; [[שְׁלִיבָה]] rung of ladder; Aram. [[שְׁלִיבִין]] appar. only 1Ki 7:28, 1Ki 7:29, 4albo0, ravine, narrow path between mountains; Ar. salaba is seize, carry off, by force);—Pt. fpl. [[מְשֻׁלָּבׂת]] Ex 26:17 tenons joined each to ([[אֶל]]) its fellow, Ex 36:22 (both P).
